Title: Directs physicians to screen newborns for neonatal abstinence syndrome
Summary: Directs physicians to screen newborns for neonatal abstinence syndrome.
LawCode: Amd ยง2500-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring facilities to screen newborns for neonatal abstinence syndrome through toxicological screening of infants' meconium or urine
